channel.title: CVE Feed for Secomea -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Secomea -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-25782|2024-08-03T04:49:43.231Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Improper Handling of Insufficient Privileges vulnerability in Web UI of Secomea GateManager allows logged in user to access and update privileged information. This issue affects: Secomea GateManager versions prior to 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-25786|2024-08-03T04:49:43.267Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Unprotected Alternate Channel vulnerability in debug console of GateManager allows system administrator to obtain sensitive information. This issue affects: GateManager all versions prior to 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-25784|2024-08-03T04:49:43.564Z -- secomea -- sitemanager
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Web GUI of SiteManager allows logged-in user to inject scripting. This issue affects: Secomea SiteManager all versions prior to 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-4308|2024-08-03T01:34:50.085Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Plaintext Storage of a Password vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (USB wizard) allows Authentication abuse on SiteManager, if the generated file is leaked.

item.title: CVE-2022-2752|2024-08-03T00:46:04.419Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description:
A vulnerability in the web server of Secomea GateManager allows a local user to impersonate as the previous user under some failed login conditions.
This issue affects:
Secomea GateManager versions from 9.4 through 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-25781|2024-08-03T04:49:43.192Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Cross-site Scripting (XSS) vulnerability in Web UI of Secomea GateManager allows phishing attacker to inject javascript or html into logged in user session.

item.title: CVE-2022-38123|2024-08-03T10:45:52.623Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description:
Improper Input Validation of plugin files in Administrator Interface of Secomea GateManager allows a server administrator to inject code into the GateManager interface.
This issue affects:
Secomea GateManager
versions prior to 10.0.

item.title: CVE-2022-25785|2024-08-03T04:49:43.219Z -- secomea -- sitemanager
item.description: Stack-based Buffer Overflow vulnerability in SiteManager allows logged-in or local user to cause arbitrary code execution. This issue affects: Secomea SiteManager all versions prior to 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-25783|2024-08-03T04:49:43.230Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Insufficient Logging vulnerability in web server of Secomea GateManager allows logged in user to issue improper queries without logging. This issue affects: Secomea GateManager versions prior to 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-25780|2024-08-03T04:49:43.496Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Information Exposure vulnerability in web UI of Secomea GateManager allows logged in user to query devices outside own scope.

item.title: CVE-2022-25779|2024-08-03T04:49:43.260Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Logging of Excessive Data vulnerability in audit log of Secomea GateManager allows logged in user to write text entries in audit log. This issue affects: Secomea GateManager versions prior to 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2022-38125|2024-08-03T10:45:52.834Z -- secomea -- sitemanager
item.description: Improper Restriction of Communication Channel to Intended Endpoints vulnerability in Secomea SiteManager (FTP Agent modules) allows Exploiting Trust in Client.

item.title: CVE-2022-25778|2024-08-03T04:49:43.681Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Cross-Site Request Forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in Web UI of Secomea GateManager allows phishing attacker to issue get request in logged in user session.

item.title: CVE-2022-38124|2024-08-03T10:45:52.627Z -- secomea -- sitemanager
item.description: Debug tool in Secomea SiteManager allows logged-in administrator to modify system state in an unintended manner.

item.title: CVE-2022-25787|2024-08-03T04:49:43.776Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Information Exposure Through Query Strings in GET Request vulnerability in LMM API of Secomea GateManager allows system administrator to hijack connection. This issue affects: Secomea GateManager all versions prior to 9.7.

item.title: CVE-2023-3675|2024-04-18T10:41:32.348Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Web GUI) allows Reading Data from System Resources.This issue affects GateManager: from 11.0.623074018 before 11.0.623373051.

item.title: CVE-2024-1969|2024-06-04T18:00:05.549Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (webserver modules) allows crash of GateManager.This issue affects GateManager: from 9.7 before 11.2.624095033.

item.title: CVE-2024-1579|2024-06-04T17:59:30.225Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Incorrect Usage of Seeds in Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG) vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Webserver modules) allows Session Hijacking.This issue affects GateManager: before 11.2.624071020.

item.title: CVE-2024-1969|2024-08-01T18:56:22.773Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Buffer Copy without Checking Size of Input ('Classic Buffer Overflow') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (webserver modules) allows crash of GateManager.This issue affects GateManager: from 9.7 before 11.2.624095033.

item.title: CVE-2024-1579|2024-08-01T18:40:21.431Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Incorrect Usage of Seeds in Pseudo-Random Number Generator (PRNG) vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Webserver modules) allows Session Hijacking.This issue affects GateManager: before 11.2.624071020.

item.title: CVE-2023-3675|2024-08-02T07:01:57.508Z -- secomea -- gatemanager
item.description: Improper Limitation of a Pathname to a Restricted Directory ('Path Traversal') vulnerability in Secomea GateManager (Web GUI) allows Reading Data from System Resources.This issue affects GateManager: from 11.0.623074018 before 11.0.623373051.
